title: Generate Daily Operations Report
description: At the end of a shift, the operations supervisor needs to generate a report summarizing the day's activities.

tasks.description: Access the reporting module in the TOS.
tasks.expected_outcome: Supervisor logs into the reporting system.

tasks.description: Run the 'Daily Operations Summary' report for the specified date.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system queries the database for all operational data for that day.

tasks.description: Review the report (e.g., total moves, vessels handled, truck turn time) and email it to the terminal management team.
tasks.expected_outcome: The supervisor reviews the KPIs and distributes the report to stakeholders.
